summary: Genie, a Chinese-American teenager, develops feelings for a charming African-American DJ, but her grandmother forbids their romance forcing Genie to choose between family and love.
cast: Bai Ling|Kieu Chinh|Kristy Wu|Anthony 'Treach' Criss|Ken Leung|Will Yun Lee|Tina Chen|Melissa Martinez|Deedee Magno|Les Mau|Tina Factor|Diane Cheng|Christy Qin|Ruth Zhang|Jim Chu|Ben Wang|Susan Bigelow|Paul J.Q. Lee|Dena Atlantic|Geronimo Frias|Dan'l Linehan|Moet Meira
title: Face
